TextView.android:text:
Every year thousands of post-secondary students have to buy materials for classes(such as books, equipment, etc). This can be a great burden for our tight budget, in fact books make up 20% of student’s yearly expenses.
How can we reduce these expenses?
One of the best solution is to buy used goods. Very often the purchase of secondhand items can save a lot of money. However the lack of a centralized space to buy/sell these materials makes this a very time consuming process.
That is why we developed "Seneca Flea”, its simplicity and user-friendly interface will save you time and money!
